head.supplied: Melbourne, 2/12/84. ¶ ¶ This evening, dear Mr Le Meslée, ¶ I received your kind letter of yesterday, also the proof of the print of my inaugural adress; ¶ the corrected proof is returned herewith. ...

div.p: ML MSS.2134/1 Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (NSW Branch) papers, Mitchell Library, State Library of NSW, Sydney.

See E. Marin La Meslée to M, 1 December 1884.
For summaries of the above letter see: ML MSS.853/2 letter register, no. 155; and ML MSS.774/1 General and Administrative Council minute book, 5 December 1884, Royal Geographical Society of Australasia, (NSW Branch), Mitchell Library. Melbourne, 2/12/84.

This evening, dear Mr Le Meslée,
sic. I received your kind letter of yesterday, also the proof of the print of my inaugural adress;
B85.13.25. the corrected proof is returned herewith. You will ere this have received an answer from Mr M'Donald,
Alexander Cameron Macdonald. expressive of the delight of the Victorian Council, that the parent-society will be represented here at our general meeting by its distinguished President,
Sir Edward Strickland. by Dr Belgrave and yourself. Our honorary Secretary will have told you of our special arrangements here; also that we will be happy to enter on a joint discussion of the questions so thoughtfully submitted to us, (and of some others, to be brought forward by us here) on the days after our general meeting here. We will have in a day or two an other Council-Meeting here, after which you will receive further communications from us.
